content: लीन {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ली-क्त] {@--1@} Clung or adhered to, stuck to. {@--2@} Lurking, hid, concealed. {@--3@} Resting or reclining on; <ls>Ś. 6. 16.</ls> {@--4@} Melted, dissolved; <ls>Māl. 5. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Completely absorbed or swallowed up in, intimately united with; नद्यः सागरे लीना भवंति. {@--6@} Devoted or given up to. {@--7@} Disappeared, vanished; (see ली).
